Standard.description: Defined by brand, can not be changed

Circle.description: Used for ui elements like radio buttons or things like avatars

Standard.description: Used for ui elements like inputs, dividers, etc.

Highlight.description: E.g. use for active menu items.

Small.description: Used for small elements like checkboxes, etc.

Standard.description: Used for our main ui elements like buttons, etc.

Large.description: Used mainly for containers like cards or dialogs

Circle.description: Used for ui elements like radio buttons or things like avatars

None.description: Use for single line in ui elements

Extra Tight.description: Use for large titles like H1 or H2

Tight.description: Use for large headlines like H3, etc.

Standard.description: Use for most text elements like normal copy, etc.

Loose.description: Use for multi line text passages with long lines.

Standard.description: Default text color with highest contrast.

Additional.description: Use in combination with standard text for additional text elements.

Standard.description: Standard text color inverted to be used on high contrast colors like ui/extra strong

Additional.description: Additional text color inverted to be used on high contrast colors like ui/extra strong

Standard.description: Light text to be used on backgrounds that are dark in all modes (light & dark)

Additional.description: Semi-Light text to be used on backgrounds that are dark in all modes (light & dark)

Standard.description: This text color is dark in all modes (light & dark)

Additional.description: This text color is dark in all modes (light & dark)

Canvas.description: Use as the background for your product (app, website, etc.)

Canvas Subtle.description: Use as the background for your product (app, website, etc.)

Backdrop.description: Use to overlay content below dialogs to separate dialog from content below

Surface.description: Use as the background of elements like cards, headers, bottom bars, etc.

Surface Subtle.description: Use as the background of elements like cards, headers, bottom bars, etc.

Surface Highlight.description: Use as the background of elements that should stand out highlighted sections, footer, etc.

Pressed.description: Use this token for borders in pressed or active state

Standard.description: For outlined and ghost elements: The standard fill is invisible / 0% opacity

Hovered.description: For outlined and ghost elements: When hovered a light, transparent fill is applied

Pressed.description: For outlined and ghost elements: When pressed or active a medium transparent fill is applied

Hovered Inverted.description: For outlined and ghost elements: When hovered a light, transparent fill is applied

Pressed Inverted.description: For outlined and ghost elements: When pressed or active a medium transparent fill is applied

Standard.description: For bigger interactable elements like cards, etc.

Hover.description: For bigger interactable elements like cards, etc.

Pressed.description: For bigger interactable elements like cards, etc.

Standard.description: For floating elements that mostly stay in a fixed position like a FAB.

Hover.description: For floating elements that mostly stay in a fixed position like a FAB.

Pressed.description: For floating elements that mostly stay in a fixed position like a FAB.

Top.description: For fixed elements that overlay the content e.g. sidebars or bottom sheets

Overlay.description: Highest level e.g. for dialogs or modals

Raised.description: Use for headers, app bar & menus on the top

Flat.description: Use for headers, app bar & menus on the top

Raised.description: Use for app navigation and app bars on the bottom

Flat.description: Use for app navigation and app bars on the bottom

Standard.description: Default text color with highest contrast.

Additional.description: Use in combination with standard text for additional text elements.

Standard.description: Standard text color inverted to be used on high contrast colors like ui/extra strong

Additional.description: Additional text color inverted to be used on high contrast colors like ui/extra strong

Standard.description: Light text to be used on backgrounds that are dark in all modes (light & dark)

Additional.description: Semi-Light text to be used on backgrounds that are dark in all modes (light & dark)

Standard.description: This text color is dark in all modes (light & dark)

Additional.description: This text color is dark in all modes (light & dark)
